subject: Short 30 second form
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE cash to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this tender will expire TONIGHT):
$431,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest entire payment!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this one-minute form... 
Do not worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!!
http://urflkght.com/
